item.title: TCS Shares Slip Amid US Tariff Jolt Despite New AI Unit, Cloud Deal; SEBI RA Sees Potential 35% Downside If ₹2700 Support Breaks
item.description: Nearly 30% of the stock's value has been eroded over the past year.

item.title: Tesla Stumbles In Europe: July Sales Plunge 40% As BYD, Hyundai-Kia Leave It In The Dust
item.description: The slowdown comes despite strong growth in Europe’s EV market, where battery-electric registrations jumped 24% this year.

item.title: Why Snowflake Stock Is Gaining Steam In Today’s Premarket
item.description: Revenue climbed 32% year-over-year (YoY) to $1.15 billion, with the growth accelerating from the first quarter’s 26%.

item.title: Trump Tariffs Pushed China's Xi To Quietly Court India, Triggering Rare Cooperation Between Asian Rivals: Report
item.description: China first reached out to India in March to improve ties, and both sides have been engaging constructively since June.
